00025 class report_datagrid extends simbio_datagrid
00026 {
00027     public $paging_set = null;
00028     public $using_AJAX = false;
00029 
00030     public function __construct()
00031     {
00032         // set default table and table header attributes
00033         $this->table_attr = 'align="center" class="dataListPrinted" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="1"';
00034         $this->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeaderPrinted"';
00035     }
00036 
00044     protected function makeOutput($int_num2show = 30)
00045     {
00046         // remove invisible field
00047         parent::removeInvisibleField();
00048         // disable row highlight
00049         $this->highlight_row = false;
00050         // get fields array and set the table header
00051         $this->setHeader($this->grid_result_fields);
00052 
00053         $_record_row = 1;
00054         // data loop
00055         foreach ($this->grid_result_rows as $_data) {
00056             // alternate the row color
00057             $_row_class = ($_record_row%2 == 0)?'alterCellPrinted':'alterCellPrinted2';
00058 
00059             // append array to table
00060             $this->appendTableRow($_data);
00061 
00062             // field style modification
00063             foreach ($this->grid_result_fields as $_idx => $_fld) {
00064                 // checking for special field width value set by column_width property array
00065                 $_row_attr = 'valign="top"';
00066                 $_classes = $_row_class;
00067                 if (isset($this->column_width[$_idx])) {
00068                     $_row_attr .= ' style="width: '.$this->column_width[$_idx].';"';
00069                 }
00070                 $this->setCellAttr($_record_row, $_idx, $_row_attr.' class="'.$_classes.'"');
00071             }
00072             $_record_row++;
00073         }
00074 
00075         // init buffer return var
00076         $_buffer = '';
00077 
00078         // create paging
00079         if ($this->num_rows > $int_num2show) {
00080             $this->paging_set = simbio_paging::paging($this->num_rows, $int_num2show, 10, '', 'reportView');
00081         } else {
00082             $this->paging_set =  '&nbsp;';
00083         }
00084         $_buffer .= '<div class="printPageInfo"><strong>'.$this->num_rows.'</strong> '.__('record(s) found. Currently displaying page').' '.$this->current_page.' ('.$int_num2show.' '.__('record each page').') <a class="printReport" onclick="window.print()" href="#">['.__('Print Current Page').']</a></div>'."\n"; //mfc
00085         $_buffer .= $this->printTable();
00086 
00087         return $_buffer;
00088     }
00089 }
